pageProduct.name: Parachoc 400mL Liquid Paraffin
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Little Parachoc Liquid Paraffin Chocolate Vanilla flavour is for the medical treatment of constipation and free from lactose, sugar and gluten.

Little Parachoc is a chocolate vanilla flavoured oral liquid for the medical treatment of constipation.

It works by gently lubricating the bowel wall and softening the faecal mass. This makes stools easier to pass to help achieve bowel movement. 

- Lactose Free
- Sugar Free
- Gluten Free


Little provides a range of products that have been specially formulated for your little ones.

We understand that it's the little things that make a big difference...

Suitable For: 1 Year+

Product Claims: For the medical treatment of constipation
Stimulant free
Dual action: lubricates and softens
Great tasting chocolate vanilla flavour
Free from lactose, sugar and gluten.

Size: 400mL

KEY FEATURES

• Stimulant free, gentle stool softener
• Chocolate vanilla flavour
• Easy to mix into food
• Free from lactose, sugar and gluten.

Warnings

Do not administer:
- Less than 2 hours before lying down
- In the presence of unexplained abdominal pain, nausea or vomiting
- To struggling, uncooperative children, to children in severe distress, with severe development delays or with reflux as there is an increased risk of aspiration (liquid paraffin being regurgitated and inhaled into the lungs). Little Parachoc is dangerous if it gets into the lungs
- To children younger than 1 year of age
- To children under 2 years of age without the advice of a doctor
- Over a long period of time without the advice of a doctor.

This product does not replace the need for a high fibre diet and high fluid intake to ensure normal bowel function. Inappropriate prolonged use of laxatives is undesirable and may lead to dependence.

If symptoms persist seek medical advice.

Contains Benzoic acid, Potassium sorbate and Saccharin sodium.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Liquid paraffin 2.5mL, Benzoic acid, Potassium sorbate, Saccharin sodium and calcium Cyclamate. Flavourings are artificial vanilla and artificial chocoaltes essences

Active Ingredients: Liquid paraffin 2.5mL
Purpose: Stool softener

Contains: Benzoic acid, Potassium sorbate, Saccharin sodium and calcium Cyclamate. Flavourings are artificial vanilla and artificial chocoaltes essences.

Allergen Free From: Gluten| Lactose| Sugar

Directions

Adequate dosage is that dose which produces one soft motion without leakage of liquid paraffin. Increase or decrease the daily dose in 5 mL graduations until desired effect is achieved.
Shake well before use. Tighten cap after use.

Age
1 year - 6 years
How much: 10 - 15mL
How often: Daily

7 years - 12 years
How much: 20mL
How often: Daily

Adults
How much: 40mL
How often: Daily

USAGE ADVICE

Use only as directed.
Do not use if seal around cap is broken or missing.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C. Keep out of direct sunlight.

Storage Temperature: Store below 30°C.
